short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DatX helps you work with loads faster and smarter than ever before

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension has completely transformed the way dispatchers book loads in the DAT freight platform. 

The one-click email sending to brokers and instant access to maps save so much time and hassle, while the pre-made templates and RPM calculations helps you work more efficiently and accurately.

This extension is developed by the dispatcher who has been trying to optimize his daily operations. The extension help them to cover trucks with a minimum reasonable effort.
